title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.7 - Filing conservation project financial assistance request
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 363.7 - Filing conservation project financial assistance request

State Regulations

Each district, utilizing a form provided by the committee, shall submit to the committee at the department's offices at 10B Airline Drive, Albany, NY 12235, a conservation financial assistance request pursuant to this
section by November 1st in any year. The information to be submitted by the
district shall include, but not be limited to, a description and a budget for
an eligible project(s). Notes

Amended

New

York State Register February 5, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 05, eff. 2/5/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
